mapper.select: /*회원이 이용권을 사용해 카페 이용하는 이용권 사용 내역 */ SELECT gm.goods_management_cd , gm.user_id , gm.order_cd , gm.goods_cd , gm.seat_cd , gm.admission_time , gm.leave_time , gm.use_time , gm.remaining_time , gm.order_expiration_date , go.give_time FROM goods_management AS gm INNER JOIN goods_order AS go on gm.order_cd = go.order_cd WHERE gm.user_id = #{sessionId} AND gm.leave_time IS NULL;

/*이용자의 좌석*/ SELECT g.seat_cd FROM goods_management AS g INNER join seat AS s ON g.seat_cd = s.seat_cd WHERE g.user_id = #{sessionId} AND g.leave_time is null AND g.seat_cd IS NOT NULL AND s.seat_state = 'N';
/*카페 이용 시간 합계*/ SELECT SEC_TO_TIME(sum(TIME_TO_SEC(use_time))) as time FROM goods_management WHERE user_id = #{sessionId};

/*이용내역 목록*/ SELECT gm.goods_management_cd , gm.user_id , gm.order_cd , gm.goods_cd , gm.seat_cd , gm.admission_time , gm.leave_time , gm.use_time , gm.remaining_time , gm.order_expiration_date ,g.goods_nm ,gc.goods_ctg_nm FROM goods_management AS gm INNER join goods AS g on gm.goods_cd = g.goods_cd INNER join goods_ctg AS gc ON g.goods_ctg_cd = gc.goods_ctg_cd WHERE user_id = #{sessionId} and seat_cd IS NOT NULL LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}

/*사용가능한 이용권 목록*/ SELECT go.order_cd ,go.goods_cd ,go.order_expiration_date ,go.give_time ,g.goods_nm ,gc.goods_ctg_nm FROM goods_order AS go INNER JOIN goods AS g on g.goods_cd = go.goods_cd INNER join goods_ctg AS gc on g.goods_ctg_cd = gc.goods_ctg_cd WHERE go.order_expiration_date > NOW() AND go.give_time> 0 AND go.user_id = #{sessionId} GROUP BY go.order_cd;
